# init(rawValue:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new text element provider with the provided raw value.

## Declaration

```swift
init(rawValue: UInt)
```

## Parameters

- **rawValue**: An unsigned Integer that represents one of the enumeration options.
title: init(rawValue:)
